plugins.name: Lsmod
plugins.description: Lists currently loaded kernel modules.

plugins.name: PsList
plugins.description: Lists the processes present in memory.

plugins.name: PsScan
plugins.description: Scans memory for processes using pool tag scanning.

plugins.name: PsTree
plugins.description: Shows the parent-child relationship between processes.

plugins.name: Malfind
plugins.description: Looks for suspicious process memory regions.

plugins.name: Lsof
plugins.description: Lists open files.

plugins.name: Netstat
plugins.description: Prints network connections, routing tables, interface statistics.

plugins.name: Sockscan
plugins.description: Scans for open sockets/connections.

plugins.name: Handles
plugins.description: Lists open handles for processes.

plugins.name: Memmap
plugins.description: Prints the memory map.

plugins.name: Memdump
plugins.description: Dumps the addressable memory for a process.

plugins.name: Cmdscan
plugins.description: Scans for COMMAND_HISTORY buffers.

plugins.name: Hivelist
plugins.description: Lists the registry hives present in memory.

plugins.name: Hashdump
plugins.description: Dumps password hashes from the SAM registry hive.

plugins.name: MFTScan
plugins.description: Scans for MFT entries in memory.

plugins.name: FileScan
plugins.description: Scans for FILE_OBJECT structures in memory.

plugins.name: Modules
plugins.description: Lists the loaded kernel modules.

plugins.name: DriverScan
plugins.description: Scans for driver objects present in memory.

plugins.name: SSDT
plugins.description: Displays the system call table.

plugins.name: Info
plugins.description: Shows OS & kernel information.

plugins.name: Strings
plugins.description: Matches physical offsets to virtual addresses.

plugins.name: YaraScan
plugins.description: Scans process or kernel memory with Yara signatures.
